## IProofService.verifyState() method

state verification function

**Signature:**

```typescript
verifyState(circuitId: string, pubSignals: Array<string>): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  circuitId | string | id of authentication circuit |
|  pubSignals | Array&lt;string&gt; | public signals of authentication circuit |
